When you join in any world or server you receive a initial Pokemob, your Pokédex, a Bag and 10 Pokécubes.\\n In your Bag you can save all placeable items in your pokemob, the most is Pokecube items.\",\"color\":\"dark_blue\"}]","{\"text\":\" For battle with Pokemob you can throw your Pokemob in any Pokemob or you can also throw in floor and attack clicking the key when looking at enemy Pokemob.\\n You can retrieve your Pokemob using key or if you lost him, do /pokerecall in local.\",\"color\":\"dark_blue\"}","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Pokecubes\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n Each Pokecube have a special ablility, Pokecube, Greatcube, Ultracube and Mastercube are purchasable from merchant NPC and you can found this in villages, but is easier to craft pokecubes.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}]","{\"text\":\"Pokécube: have catchrate 1x\\n\\nGreatcube: have catchrate 1,5x\\n\\nUltracube: have catchrate 2x\\n\\nMastercube: catch any pokemob, if you have requirements\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Duskcube: if night or low light Duskcube have 4x catchrate.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\"Quickcube: have a catchrate 4x for newly spawned pokemobs.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\"Timercube: have a higher catch rate for older pokemobs.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Netcube: to catch insect and water pokemob have 3x catchrate.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\"Nestcube: higher catchrate for low lvl pokemob.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\"Repeatcube: if you already have pokemob you have 3x more chance to capture.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Premier and Cherish cubes have 1x catchrate.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\"Snagcube: Used to capture Shadow Pokemobs\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\"Divecube: have 3,5x chance to catch water pokemobs underwater.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Pokédex\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" First tab in Pokédex is to you can see pokemob in dex.\\n\\n In the second Dex tab you can see all atks your pokemon can learn.\\n\\n In third tab you can see your user stats and see all pokemon spawn in biome.\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\" And in fourth tab you can see possible mates and pokemon status\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" Obs: in first tab you can also see the pokemob stats example: atk, def and also see your Evs and Ivs.\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\" Pokédex also give gifts that you can receive clicking in blue button if pokedex send to you a msg.\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" You receive gifts capturing new pokemobs in dex, and the order of gifts is 1.Tms, 2.Exp Share, 3.Mastercube and 4.Shiny charm. The last gift you receive\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"}]","{\"text\":\"completing a half of your pokédex.\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"}","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Legendary Pokemon\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"dark_purple\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" Have some pokemon still dont have way to get but alot of spawn in determined biome, servers can set the minimum lvl they can spawn at.\\n\\n For celebi you want to catch more grass type pokemon.\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\" For Ho-oh you want to have all legendary dogs.\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" For Raikou want to have half of eletric type pokemon.\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" For Suicune half of water pokemon.\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" For Entei half of fire type pokemon.\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\" For Mew you want to have shiny charm requirements.\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" For regis you want Relicanth and Wailord.\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" For Groudon you want to have half of ground pokemobs and kill half of water. And opposite for Kyogre.\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Mega Evolutions\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"gold\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" To do mega evolutions you want to do and equip, MegaHat, MegaRing, or MegaBelt and buy from NPC a megastone of pokemob, equip pokemob and press key .\",\"color\":\"gold\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Fossil Pokemon\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"dark_red\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n To get fossil pokemobs you want to found fossils in DesertHills, Ocean, Jungle and JungleHills and make a fossil machine, and then place the fossil in machine.\",\"color\":\"dark_red\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Berries\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" Berries can be found from killing pokemob and you can plant it to have more.\\n Each berry as a different effect.\\n You should put berries in your pokemob's inventory for it to not get hungry.\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Tms\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"blue\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\" TMs can be made in TM table. You can craft TM Table and if you place on the side of a pc it identifies your pokemob in pc and yours attacks. Can copy a attack if you already have, make a blank TM and place it in TM Table.\",\"color\":\"blue\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Evs/Ivs\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"aqua\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n IVs are genetic stats of pokemobs and you only can trade IVs breeding your pokemob or capturing other.\\n EVs you can train by killing certain pokemobs \",\"color\":\"aqua\"},{\"text\":\"http://pokemondb.net/ev/all\",\"underlined\":true,\"color\":\"dark_blue\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"open_url\",\"value\":\"http://pokemondb.net/ev/all\"}},{\"text\":\" here you can see what pokemobs give certain EVs\",\"color\":\"aqua\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Wikis\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n If you want to know more about Pokecube, Pokecube has two wikis:\",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\"https://github.com/thutmose/pokecube/wiki\",\"underlined\":true,\"color\":\"dark_blue\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"open_url\",\"value\":\"https://github.com/thutmose/pokecube/wiki\"}},{\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"color\":\"reset\"},{\"text\":\"pokecubemod.wikia.com/wiki/PokecubeMod_Wikia\",\"underlined\":true,\"color\":\"dark_blue\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"open_url\",\"value\":\"pokecubemod.wikia.com/wiki/PokecubeMod_Wikia\"}}]"],title:"Pokecube Guide",author:falcojack,display:{Lore:["Starter Guide to Pokecube"]}}
